name: Curious Companion
text: Heroes tend to pick up the oddest friends—birds of the sky and beasts of the wood. Your companions are strange even by these standards.
benefit: You can select a plant companion or vermin companion as your animal companion.
text_zh: 不论是天上的飞鸟亦或者林中的野兽，英雄们总倾向于获得不同寻常的伙伴。然而即使以这个标准，你的伙伴也极为离奇。
benefit_zh: 你可以选择一个植物伙伴或昆虫伙伴来作为你的动物伙伴。
